llm_res.rule: approve function should return true on success
Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.

transferFrom Transfers _value amount of tokens from address _from to address _to, and MUST fire the Transfer event. The function SHOULD throw unless the _from account has deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism. Note Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event. The function should return true on success.
